data.message: Someone is posting from my mom's Facebook account. I know it is not her, as she passed away in March 2016. What I need help with, if it is possible, is to remove their post and set my mom's account to legacy.

replies.message: Our sincerest condolences for your loss, Christina. You can send us a request to memorialize your mother's account here: http://bit.ly/2uicbgo. When an account is memorialized, it is secured and no one can log into it. We hope this help. -Elizabeth
Will you be able to remove the post, someone posted from her account, about 9 hours ago? That freaked us all out to see.
I managed to get into her account and remove the post. Just sent my request to have memorialized.
